title: How Intelligent Are Professional Rugby Players? (feat. Bristol Bears)
description: In this video, Max Fosh visits the Bristol Bears rugby team to find out just how intelligent professional rugby players are.
summary: Max Fosh tests the intelligence of professional rugby players from the Bristol Bears team.
payoff: The payoff comes when the rugby players are tested on their general knowledge and logic skills, leading to some hilarious and surprising moments as their intelligence is put to the test.
